articles.content: Grant, who grew up in rural Victoria, had considered writing about Port Arthur for a decade before a spate of mass killings while he was living in Los Angeles finally convinced him to try. "Within a … [+7053 chars]

articles.title: Secret Santa's fast becoming a family tradition that saves time, money and the environment - ABC News

articles.content:
